commands.starcatcher.rod_not_found: You must have a StarcatcherCompatible™ rod in your hand
commands.starcatcher.item_empty: You must have an item in your hand to apply the modifier to
tooltip.minecraft.fishing_rod.0: A simple fishing rod used for catching
tooltip.minecraft.fishing_rod.2: One can only dream of upgrading
tooltip.starcatcher.starcatcher_rod.0: A special fishing rod which allows
tooltip.starcatcher.starcatcher_rod.1: for the use of bobbers, bait and hooks.
tooltip.starcatcher.starcatcher_rod.2: Who knows what you might catch
tooltip.starcatcher.starcatcher_rod.3: given the right conditions are met!
tooltip.starcatcher.starcatcher_rod.5: Right Click whilst crouching to open
tooltip.starcatcher.naturalist_rod.0: A lost rod found very rarely in forests.
tooltip.starcatcher.naturalist_rod.1: It appears to be nothing more than a
tooltip.starcatcher.iceborn_rod.0: A frozen rod made by an Iceborn, left
tooltip.starcatcher.iceborn_rod.1: behind in a cold ocean for you to find.
tooltip.starcatcher.magmaforged_rod.1: Found very rarely in the depths
tooltip.starcatcher.slimed_rod.0: A slimy rod found rarely in
tooltip.starcatcher.sharktooth_rod.0: A toy rod crafted to look like a shark.
tooltip.starcatcher.sharktooth_rod.1: Left behind inside a satchel by whoever owned in.
tooltip.starcatcher.azure_crystal_rod.0: A <rgb>Legendary</rgb> rod made of pure azure crystals.
tooltip.starcatcher.azure_crystal_rod.1: It's said the <gradient-30>Older Anglers</gradient-50> gift this rod
tooltip.starcatcher.azure_crystal_rod.2: to those to manage to greed for a treasure whilst catching an <rgb>Aurora</rgb>
tooltip.starcatcher.good_old_rod.0: A simple rod, now supportive of bobbers, hooks and baits.
tooltip.starcatcher.bamboo_rod.0: A rod built of bamboo, found rarely in bamboo jungles.
tooltip.starcatcher.obsidian_rod.0: A tough rod made of obsidian.
tooltip.starcatcher.obsidian_rod.1: Found rarely in surface lava lakes,
tooltip.starcatcher.alpha_rod.0: A rod reminiscing of old times.
tooltip.starcatcher.sky_rod.0: A rod made amongst the clouds.
tooltip.starcatcher.sky_rod.1: Found very rarely when fishing close to heaven
tooltip.starcatcher.lush_glowberry_rod.0: A glowing glowberry rod that glows just like glowberries.
tooltip.starcatcher.lush_glowberry_rod.1: Rarely fished up from lush caves.
tooltip.starcatcher.humble_rod.0: A very humble rod found rarely in rivers.
tooltip.starcatcher.starcatcher_guide.0: An angler's best companion, keeping track
tooltip.starcatcher.starcatcher_guide.1: of all the fishes you've caught, and
tooltip.starcatcher.starcatcher_guide.2: those you have yet to reel in!
tooltip.starcatcher.starcatcher_twine.0: A delicate twine wrapped around a stick.
tooltip.starcatcher.starcatcher_twine.1: Vansire used these for string instruments once upon a time.
tooltip.modifier.starcatcher.freeze_on_m: Missing a sweet-spot will cause your
reel to freeze up for a short period
tooltip.modifier.starcatcher.spawn_froze: Every so often a frozen sweet-spot
might show up which freezes your reel when hit
tooltip.modifier.starcatcher.low_chance_: There is a low chance a treasure chest
might appear when hitting a sweet-spot
tooltip.modifier.starcatcher.spawn_treas: Successfully hitting 3 sweet-spots in a row
tooltip.modifier.starcatcher.extra_exp_b: Extra exp is awarded based on your performance
tooltip.modifier.starcatcher.stop_decay_: Prevents your catch from swimming away
for a short period after hitting a sweet-spot
tooltip.modifier.starcatcher.harder_with: The catch will be harder than usual,
but a perfect catch awards a treasure
tooltip.modifier.starcatcher.double_item: An extra fish will be added to your catch
tooltip.modifier.starcatcher.no_flip.0: Sweet-spots will no longer flip when hit
tooltip.modifier.starcatcher.bigger_gree: Green sweet-spots will be slightly bigger
tooltip.modifier.starcatcher.slower_vani: Vanishing sweet-spots will take longer to vanish
tooltip.modifier.starcatcher.add_aqua_sw: An extra aqua sweet-spot is added
tooltip.modifier.starcatcher.add_three_a: Three extra aqua sweet-spot are added
tooltip.modifier.starcatcher.fish_entity: If available, will catch the live fish instead
tooltip.modifier.starcatcher.guarantee_n: If available, new catches will be prioritized
tooltip.starcatcher.hook.0: A basic iron hook for your fishing rod.
tooltip.starcatcher.bobber.0: A basic bobber for your fishing rod.
tooltip.starcatcher.vanilla_bobber.2: it will attract vanilla-flavoured fishes and treasures.
tooltip.starcatcher.worm.0: A basic worm bait which every fish likes.
tooltip.starcatcher.worm.1: Used by anglers as an easy way to get quicker bites.
tooltip.starcatcher.seeking_worm.0: A very powerful magical worm known for seeking
tooltip.starcatcher.seeking_worm.1: fishes which the angler has yet to catch.
tooltip.starcatcher.seeking_worm.2: Useful for completionists looking for fill up their collection.
tooltip.starcatcher.almighty_worm.0: A strong worm which prevents fishes from being killed
tooltip.starcatcher.almighty_worm.1: when being caught! Be careful when using this worm as a
tooltip.starcatcher.almighty_worm.2: bait as you might get slapped by a flying cod.
tooltip.starcatcher.gunpowder_bait.0: An attempt at a bait made from gunpowder.
tooltip.starcatcher.gunpowder_bait.1: No angler has attempted to use it before,
tooltip.starcatcher.cherry_bait.0: A bait made of pink petals which fish
tooltip.starcatcher.lush_bait.0: A lush bait made mostly of moss which
tooltip.starcatcher.lush_bait.1: often attracts fish living in the Lush Caves.
tooltip.starcatcher.sculk_bait.0: A silent bait made from sculk remains
tooltip.starcatcher.sculk_bait.1: known for attracting even the quietest
tooltip.starcatcher.sculk_bait.2: fish down in the Deep Dark.
tooltip.starcatcher.dripstone_bait.0: A hard bait made from dripstone,
tooltip.starcatcher.dripstone_bait.1: sure to charm in even the stiffest of fishes.
tooltip.starcatcher.murkwater_bait.0: A murky bait suited for swamp fishing.
who would usually only come out during
tooltip.starcatcher.legendary_bait.name: <rgb>Legendary Bait</rgb>
tooltip.starcatcher.legendary_bait.1: fish can't seem to swim past.
tooltip.starcatcher.kimbe_bobber_smithin: A template for your rod which may be applied at a
Smithing Table to change your bobber's appearance.
tooltip.starcatcher.pearl_bobber_smithin: A template for your rod which may be applied at a
Smithing Table to change your bobber's appearance.
tooltip.starcatcher.colorful_bobber_smit: A template for your rod which may be applied at a
Smithing Table to change your bobber's appearance.
It shines as if saying [click me]
tooltips.starcatcher.unknown_fish.0: template fish used in the minigame for entries which hide the item being fished
tooltip.starcatcher.fish_radar.0: A handy radar which displays the fishes
tooltip.starcatcher.fish_radar.1: around the area in a total futuristic way.
item.starcatcher.fish_bones.1: remains of a once happy fish.
tooltip.starcatcher.treasure.0: A shiny treasure fished by a skilled angler.
tooltip.starcatcher.scalding_treasure.0: A treasure fished directly from the scalding
tooltip.starcatcher.scalding_treasure.1: lands of The Nether. What's inside?
tooltip.starcatcher.trophy.0: A trophy proving of one's skill.
tooltip.starcatcher.trophy.1: It is said to appear in an angler's fishing line
tooltip.starcatcher.trophy.both.1: and <rgb>[&]</rgb> total fishes have been caught!
gui.guide.page0.left.5: If you wish to catch more
gui.guide.page0.left.10: on one, it's time to cast!
gui.guide.page0.right.3: These fish won't give in so
gui.guide.page0.right.4: easily, make sure to hit all
gui.guide.page0.right.15: the same way so be ready
gui.guide.page1.right.3: But do you have the skill
gui.guide.page1.right.10: a hard fight if you wish to
gui.guide.page1.right.18: to grab them when you can!
gui.guide.lakes.hover: Surface biomes besides Rivers and Oceans
gui.secret_note.sample_note.0: Hey how did you get this note??
gui.secret_note.sample_note.1: Are you cheating in creative mode??
gui.secret_note.sample_note.3: These notes should only be obtained through
gui.secret_note.sample_note.4: bottles otherwise they won't have the correct
gui.secret_note.sample_note.5: data and might crash the game! Be careful.
gui.secret_note.crystal_hook.2: After yesterday's trouble I decided it's best
gui.secret_note.crystal_hook.3: I finally get my hands on some diamond tools.
gui.secret_note.crystal_hook.5: That's what past me thought anyways,
gui.secret_note.crystal_hook.6: if I knew I would accidentally drop my crystal
gui.secret_note.crystal_hook.7: hook down by the deepslate water lakes
gui.secret_note.crystal_hook.8: I would have never went down there.
gui.secret_note.crystal_hook.10: If anyone finds this letter drifting amid the
gui.secret_note.crystal_hook.11: oceans, you are welcome to take my precious
gui.secret_note.crystal_hook.12: Crystal Hook. Once you've caught at least
gui.secret_note.crystal_hook.14: will shine their blessing upon you and
gui.secret_note.crystal_hook.15: my crystal hook will bite your hook.
gui.secret_note.lava_proof_bottle_1.5: I am so tired of these SCAMMERS promising
gui.secret_note.lava_proof_bottle_1.7: survive being submerged in lava! Wanna see
gui.secret_note.lava_proof_bottle_1.8: what I think of your stupid <gradient-00>Lava-Proof™</gradient-14>
gui.secret_note.lava_proof_bottle_1.11: This letter is going right into this so-called
gui.secret_note.lava_proof_bottle_1.13: nearest lava pool I can find! Heh that will
gui.secret_note.lava_proof_bottle_2.1: If anyone finds this letter, I would like
gui.secret_note.lava_proof_bottle_2.2: to apologise about my previous letter.
gui.secret_note.lava_proof_bottle_2.6: I must admit after so many scams and
gui.secret_note.lava_proof_bottle_2.8: skeptical and never even gave them a shot.
gui.secret_note.lava_proof_bottle_2.10: What can I say, you live and you learn.
gui.secret_note.lava_proof_bottle_2.12: I have to go now, I heard there's a new
gui.secret_note.hopeful_note.5: It has now been over half a year since I
gui.secret_note.hopeful_note.6: embarked on this journey to find a
gui.secret_note.hopeful_note.7: <gradient-55>Heart of the Sea</gradient-65>. My hope grows dim but
gui.secret_note.hopeful_note.8: I will search for it until the end of my days.
gui.secret_note.hopeless_note.5: This is hopeless. There is no <gradient-55>Heart of the</gradient-65>
gui.secret_note.hopeless_note.6: <gradient-55>Sea</gradient-65>. Those BASTARDS lied to me. I am
gui.secret_note.hopeless_note.7: never returning home. Little Jimmy will forever
gui.secret_note.hopeless_note.8: live with the thought his dad went after an
gui.secret_note.hopeless_note.11: It really is my fault. How could I be such a
gui.secret_note.hopeless_note.12: fool as to believe an item could possibly
gui.secret_note.hopeless_note.13: allow you to breath underwater. Unbelievable.
gui.secret_note.true_blue.9: Ten years or ten moments ago,
gui.secret_note.wither_note.4: I would be more careful if I were you...
gui.secret_note.wither_note.7: You never know what you might catch
tooltip.starcatcher.secret_note.0: An old secret note almost lost to time.
tooltip.starcatcher.secret_note.1: Holding nothing more than the thoughts of
tooltip.starcatcher.secret_note.2: those probably not amongst us anymore.
tooltip.starcatcher.broken_bottle.0: The remains of an once intact bottle.
tooltip.starcatcher.drifting_waterlogged: A bottle found drifting amid the oceans.
tooltip.starcatcher.scalding_bottle.0: A scalding hot Bottle. Nothing remarkable about it.
tooltip.starcatcher.scalding_bottle.1: Wait... Could this really be a <gradient-00>Lava-Proof™</gradient-14> bottle!?
tooltip.starcatcher.scalding_bottle.2: I never thought these were real!
tooltip.starcatcher.scalding_bottle.3: Unfortunately it seems like breaking it open is the
tooltip.starcatcher.scalding_bottle.4: only way to get the message out...
tooltip.starcatcher.burning_bottle.0: A burning bottle. There is no hiding it, this
tooltip.starcatcher.hopeless_bottle.0: A hopeless Bottle. Or rather, the message inside is.
tooltip.starcatcher.hopeful_bottle.0: Somehow just looking at this bottle
tooltip.starcatcher.hopeful_bottle.1: makes you hopeful of the future to come.
tooltip.starcatcher.starcaught_bucket.cr: [CREATIVE MODE] This bucket will always spawn an Aurora. To get the corresponding [Bucket of X] you must catch it through normal means using a bucket as a bait.
If you wish to summon the fish entity, you can right click on the ground with the fish item in creative mode.
tooltip.starcatcher.morganite.0: An ocean fish resembling Morganite gemstones.
tooltip.starcatcher.silverveil_perch.0: A small perch with scales resembling silver.
tooltip.starcatcher.silverveil_perch.1: Most commonly found during rainy days.
tooltip.starcatcher.elderscale.0: A deceiving fish often found in lakes.
tooltip.starcatcher.elderscale.1: Elderscales may live up to several decades and often
tooltip.starcatcher.elderscale.2: spend all day hiding during their youth, making sighing a
tooltip.starcatcher.elderscale.3: young one little more than a rumor, therefore the name.
tooltip.starcatcher.driftfin.0: A small fish which loves drifting close to
tooltip.starcatcher.driftfin.1: the surface on clear weather days.
tooltip.starcatcher.twilight_koi.0: A rather rare species of Koi said to
tooltip.starcatcher.twilight_koi.1: only appear at lakes during the midnight hours.
tooltip.starcatcher.thunder_bass.0: A unique species of bass which seems to be
tooltip.starcatcher.thunder_bass.1: attracted by the thunder sounds during storms.
tooltip.starcatcher.thunder_bass.2: Often seen swimming around with Lighting Bass.
tooltip.starcatcher.lightning_bass.0: A unique species of bass which seems to be
tooltip.starcatcher.lightning_bass.1: attracted by the lighting flashes during storms.
tooltip.starcatcher.lightning_bass.2: Often seen swimming around with Thunder Bass.
tooltip.starcatcher.boot.0: An incredibly high quality boot fished from a lake.
tooltip.starcatcher.frostjaw_trout.0: A trout species known for it's sharp
tooltip.starcatcher.frostjaw_trout.1: jaws made of petrified ice crystals.
tooltip.starcatcher.crystalback_trout.0: A tough trout species which uses it's
tooltip.starcatcher.crystalback_trout.1: back as a way to protect itself when attacked.
tooltip.starcatcher.aurora.name: <rgb>Aurora</rgb>
tooltip.starcatcher.aurora.0: A beautiful <rgb>legendary</rgb> fish. It's size makes for an
tooltip.starcatcher.aurora.1: incredibly hard and evasive catch, not letting the angler
tooltip.starcatcher.aurora.2: rest if they wish to take it home as proof of their skills.
tooltip.starcatcher.wintery_pike.0: A predatory fish. This specific species loves cold
tooltip.starcatcher.wintery_pike.1: climates and is often found inside icy lakes.
tooltip.starcatcher.sandtail.0: A long sand-covered fish, which although mostly
tooltip.starcatcher.sandtail.1: found in warm climates, prefers the cold of the night
tooltip.starcatcher.mirage_carp.0: A carp species found during warm sunny days on warm climates.
tooltip.starcatcher.mirage_carp.1: Its said it got it's name from desert villagers,
tooltip.starcatcher.mirage_carp.2: as spotting one was often just a mirage.
tooltip.starcatcher.scorchfish.0: A fish species which hates the rain,
tooltip.starcatcher.scorchfish.1: and as such prefers to stay around warmer climates.
tooltip.starcatcher.cactifish.0: Although the name might suggest this fish
tooltip.starcatcher.cactifish.1: is connected to cacti in some way, it is
tooltip.starcatcher.cactifish.2: just a coincidence on it's green colored scales.
tooltip.starcatcher.agave_bream.0: A rare bream which only comes out at night
tooltip.starcatcher.agave_bream.1: during clear weather. It's long fins help
tooltip.starcatcher.agave_bream.2: navigating the dirty lakes of deserts.
tooltip.starcatcher.agave_bream.3: It is said this fish loves mangosteens
tooltip.starcatcher.sunny_sturgeon.0: A rare surgeon often found high up in mountains during sunny days.
tooltip.starcatcher.sunny_sturgeon.1: Because of it's size it's a rather hard catch,
tooltip.starcatcher.sunny_sturgeon.2: requiring a strong grip and tight adjustments of your rod.
tooltip.starcatcher.peakdweller.0: A golden colored fish common to mountains.
tooltip.starcatcher.peakdweller.1: Not an easy catch for inexperienced anglers.
tooltip.starcatcher.rockgill.0: A rock-hard fish common to the high mountains.
tooltip.starcatcher.rockgill.1: It is said to make for a great stew, at least for
tooltip.starcatcher.rockgill.2: those who have the teeth to bite through its skin
tooltip.starcatcher.sun_seeking_carp.0: A rare sun-loving carp, only found when
tooltip.starcatcher.sun_seeking_carp.1: the sun is right above your head.
tooltip.starcatcher.sludge_catfish.0: A dirty catfish species common to murky swamp
tooltip.starcatcher.sludge_catfish.1: waters. Said to make a great dish if washes properly.
tooltip.starcatcher.lily_snapper.0: A thin long rare snapper species common to swamps.
tooltip.starcatcher.lily_snapper.1: It hunts other fishes with it's pointy mouth.
tooltip.starcatcher.sage_catfish.0: A beautiful sage-colored catfish found in swamps.
tooltip.starcatcher.sage_catfish.1: It only comes out during clear nights to admire
tooltips.starcatcher.mossy_boot.0: A boot, but this time it's mossy!
tooltip.starcatcher.pale_pinfish.0: A tiny pale pinfish, only found around midnight
tooltip.starcatcher.pale_pinfish.1: in dark forests. It wishes to exist in a version
tooltip.starcatcher.pinfish.0: A tiny pale pinfish, only found around midnight
tooltip.starcatcher.pale_carp.0: A carp species common to the [redacted].
tooltip.starcatcher.pale_carp.1: Their habitat is still under construction in this
tooltip.starcatcher.pale_carp.2: universe so instead they stick to the dark forest.
tooltip.starcatcher.blossomfish.0: A beautiful fish resembling the pink petals of Cherry Grooves.
tooltip.starcatcher.blossomfish.1: It prefers to swim around in the warm sunlight.
tooltip.starcatcher.vesani.0: This species of fish is really good
tooltip.starcatcher.vesani.2: It's unusual to see them out in the
tooltip.starcatcher.petaldrift_carp.0: A pink carp common to Cherry Grooves which
tooltip.starcatcher.petaldrift_carp.1: prefers to come out during the rain.
tooltip.starcatcher.pink_koi.0: A pink koi most commonly found in Cherry Grooves.
tooltip.starcatcher.pink_koi.1: It comes out during rainy days to feed.
tooltip.starcatcher.rose_siamese_fish.0: A rare gorgeous fish found during rainy days.
tooltip.starcatcher.rose_siamese_fish.1: A decently challenging catch for even experienced anglers.
tooltip.starcatcher.crystalback_sturgeon: A sturgeon often found in high altitudes,
known for it's crystalback which helps it passively
tooltip.starcatcher.icetooth_sturgeon.0: Found high up in the mountains, this sturgeon
tooltip.starcatcher.icetooth_sturgeon.1: uses it's sharp petrified ice teeth to bite down on prey.
tooltip.starcatcher.boreal.0: A <rgb>legendary</rgb>  fish found in icy mountains.
tooltip.starcatcher.boreal.1: A real challenge even for skilled anglers, they are
tooltip.starcatcher.boreal.2: known for blending into the icy waters making it hard
tooltip.starcatcher.crystalback_boreal.0: Although named after the <rgb>legendary</rgb>  fish <rgb>Boreal</rgb>, this
tooltip.starcatcher.crystalback_boreal.1: fish is not nearly as hard to catch. Its shiny back makes it
tooltip.starcatcher.crystalback_boreal.2: easy to keep track and the crystallized back slows down its swimming speed.
tooltip.starcatcher.silverfin_pike.0: A large pike common to rivers.
tooltip.starcatcher.willow_bream.0: A really trick to catch fish which
tooltip.starcatcher.drifting_bream.0: A species of bream known for slowly
tooltip.starcatcher.downfall_bream.0: A hard to spot but easy to catch bream,
tooltip.starcatcher.downfall_bream.1: only coming out during rainy nights.
tooltip.starcatcher.hollowbelly_darter.0: A really small easy to catch river fish.
tooltip.starcatcher.mistback_chub.0: A river fish known for its silver colored scaled
tooltip.starcatcher.bluegigi.0: Not to be confused with a bluegill,
tooltip.starcatcher.bluegigi.1: this small fish is rather common around rivers.
tooltip.starcatcher.dried_seaweed.0: A piece of dead seaweed which got
tooltip.starcatcher.crystalback_minnow.0: A really small fish often used as bait.
tooltip.starcatcher.crystalback_minnow.1: This specific species is most common at nighttime.
tooltip.starcatcher.azure_crystalback_mi: A rare mutation of crystalback minnow's
which glows a soft blue tone during midnight.
A challenging catch due to it's tiny size.
tooltip.starcatcher.blue_crystal_fin.0: An uncommon fish most commonly found during daytime.
tooltip.starcatcher.ironjaw_herring.0: This type of herring common to the ocean often
tooltip.starcatcher.ironjaw_herring.1: has a petrified silvery jaw resembling iron.
tooltip.starcatcher.deepjaw_herring.0: A fish common to oceans, often regarded highly for trading.
tooltip.starcatcher.dusktail_snapper.0: A heavy fish for it's size often used in dishes.
tooltip.starcatcher.joel.0: A rare <rgb>legendary</rgb> fish found in oceans.
tooltip.starcatcher.redscaled_tuna.0: A large tuna with red colored scales.
tooltip.starcatcher.redscaled_tuna.1: A single one of these often feeds an entire village.
tooltip.starcatcher.sea_bass.0: A popular type of bass common to the ocean.
tooltip.starcatcher.sea_bass.1: It hides during the night due to it's lack bravery.
tooltip.starcatcher.waterlogged_bottle.0: A bottle thrown into the ocean many moons ago.
tooltip.starcatcher.waterlogged_bottle.1: Whatever it once held, it's long gone by now.
tooltip.starcatcher.bigeye_tuna.name: <gradient-37>Bigeye Tuna</gradient-43>
tooltip.starcatcher.bigeye_tuna.0: A big heavy fish known for it's big eye.
tooltip.starcatcher.bigeye_tuna.1: This species is only found in deep ocean waters.
tooltip.starcatcher.bigeye_tuna.2: It's said to hang around other Kaupen fish.
tooltip.starcatcher.conch.0: The remains of a mollusk with a spiral shell often used as an ornament.
tooltip.starcatcher.clam.0: Once a bivalve mollusk living in the sandy shores, now just a shell.
tooltip.starcatcher.shroomfish.0: An antique <rgb>legendary</rgb> fish species taken over by the spores
tooltip.starcatcher.shroomfish.1: of the Mushroom Islands. A really tasty dish for mushroom enjoyers.
tooltip.starcatcher.sporefish.0: A rare fish found in the Mushroom Islands, may prove a
tooltip.starcatcher.gold_fan.0: An underground fish with a tail that resembles a fan.
tooltip.starcatcher.gold_fan.1: As funny as it would be, it does not spin its tail like a fan to move around.
tooltip.starcatcher.geode_eel.1: Their color and texture comes from infused amethyst
tooltip.starcatcher.geode_eel.2: due to their eggs being hatched inside amethyst geodes.
tooltip.starcatcher.whiteveil.0: A pale long-finned fish common underground.
tooltip.starcatcher.whiteveil.1: surprisingly heavy for what looks like a ghost.
tooltip.starcatcher.black_eel.0: A carnivorous black eel common underground.
tooltip.starcatcher.amethystback.0: A rare hard to catch fish common close to amethyst geodes.
tooltip.starcatcher.stonefish.0: A huge heavy fish made of stone,
tooltip.starcatcher.fossilized_angelfish: It is not actually fossilised and is often
ignored due to its low nutritional value,
heavy weight and high difficulty to catch.
tooltip.starcatcher.dripfin.0: A basic fish which inhabits the
tooltip.starcatcher.lush_pike.1: found in the Lush Caves. A real tough
tooltip.starcatcher.vivid_moss.0: A piece of moss resembling a fish found in Lush Caves.
tooltip.starcatcher.vivid_moss.1: Or perhaps an actual fish consumed in moss?
tooltip.starcatcher.vivid_moss.2: Either way it's a hard catch due to its slipperiness.
tooltip.starcatcher.the_quarrish.0: A fish often seen around the overgrown lush caves.
tooltip.starcatcher.the_quarrish.1: Its heavy size makes for a very tedious catch.
tooltip.starcatcher.ghostly_pike.0: A ghost-looking pike rarely found deep underground.
tooltip.starcatcher.aquamarine_pike.0: A predatory fish found deep underground.
tooltip.starcatcher.garnet_mackerel.0: A hard to catch mackerel species found deep in caves.
tooltip.starcatcher.bright_amethyst_snap: A gorgeous pink colored fish found at deepslate level.
It's said to always swim around with it's pair of Dark Amethyst Snapper.
tooltip.starcatcher.dark_amethyst_snappe: A gorgeous dark blue colored fish found at deepslate level.
It's said to always swim around with it's pair of Bright Amethyst Snapper.
tooltip.starcatcher.deepslatefish.0: A hard to catch fish found high up in the mountains.
tooltip.starcatcher.deepslatefish.1: Just kidding. It's found at deepslate.
tooltip.starcatcher.sculkfish.0: A tricky fish corrupted by Sculk.
tooltip.starcatcher.ward.0: A <rgb>legendary</rgb> fish said to be best friends with the warden.
tooltip.starcatcher.ward.1: Instead of resisting Sculk, this fish embraced it and became stronger for it.
tooltip.starcatcher.glowing_dark.0: A fast fish only found in the deep dark.
tooltip.starcatcher.glowing_dark.1: A fast fish only found in the deep dark.
tooltip.starcatcher.suneater.0: A rare fish found in the lava lakes of the Overworld.
tooltip.starcatcher.suneater.1: It hunts down sunfishes for food.
tooltip.starcatcher.pyrotrout.0: A trout adapted to live in the surface lava of the Overworld.
tooltip.starcatcher.obsidian_eel.0: A <rgb>legendary</rgb> species of eel made of obsidian, found
tooltip.starcatcher.obsidian_eel.1: during rainy days inside Overworld lava lakes.
tooltip.starcatcher.obsidian_eel.2: It often requires several anglers to carry
tooltip.starcatcher.molten_shrimp.0: A small shrimp found in lava rivers underground.
tooltip.starcatcher.obsidian_crab.0: An illusive crab found close to underground lava pools.
tooltip.starcatcher.scorched_bloodsucker: A hard to catch parasite found in deepslate lava lakes.
tooltip.starcatcher.molten_deepslate_cra: A gold colored crab found at deepslate levels close to lava rivers.
tooltip.starcatcher.embergill.0: A fish found in the vast lava oceans of The Nether.
tooltip.starcatcher.scalding_pike.0: A predatory fish only found in The Nether.
tooltip.starcatcher.cinder_squid.0: A slippery squid found in The Nether.
tooltip.starcatcher.lava_crab.0: This particular species of crab somehow entered The Nether
tooltip.starcatcher.lava_crab.1: and evolved a protective shell out of netherrack.
tooltip.starcatcher.magma_fish.0: A common Nether fish known for it's red glowing fins.
tooltip.starcatcher.glowstone_seeker.0: A fish which seems to be weirdly attracted
tooltip.starcatcher.glowstone_seeker.1: to glowstone, usually swimming under it.
tooltip.starcatcher.glowstone_pufferfish: A pufferfish glittering just like glowstone.
tooltip.starcatcher.willish.0: A fish commonly known for scamming
tooltip.starcatcher.willish.1: other fishes out of their food.
tooltip.starcatcher.willish.2: It is incredibly ugly and should be
tooltip.starcatcher.willish.3: discarded back to The Nether where it belongs.
tooltip.starcatcher.lava_crab_claw.0: A claw ripped off from a Lava Crab.
tooltip.starcatcher.lava_crab_claw.1: Due to the aggressive nature of Lava Crabs,
tooltip.starcatcher.lava_crab_claw.2: it's quite a common find in The Nether.
tooltip.starcatcher.charfish.0: A purple fish only found in The End.
tooltip.starcatcher.chorus_crab.0: This crab species uses Chorus fruit as it's main source of food.
tooltip.starcatcher.chorus_crab.1: It is said it can teleport around at will after feeding.
tooltip.starcatcher.end_glow.0: A tricky fish only found in The End.
tooltip.starcatcher.end_glow.1: Enderman don't seem to mind it.
tooltip.starcatcher.voidbiter.0: A <rgb>legendary</rgb> fish found in outer islands of The End.
tooltip.starcatcher.voidbiter.1: So few anglers have seen it that it's only rumored to exist.
tooltip.starcatcher.voidbiter.2: It's said only <gradient-30>Older Anglers</gradient-50> have successfully
advancements.husbandry.starcatcher.fishe: Catch a Fish without missing once
